name: IOUserNetworkPacket
desc: A network packet containing the data for your driver to process.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the network packet.

items.name: - SetHeadroom
items.desc: Changes the number of bytes to reserve at the front of the packet's buffer to the specified value.

items.name: - SetLinkHeaderLength
items.desc: Changes the number of bytes to use for the link header to the specified value.

items.name: - SetDataOffset
items.desc: Changes the offset to the beginning of the packet's data to the specified value.

items.name: - SetDataLength
items.desc: Changes the number of bytes of data in the packet to the specified value.

items.name: - GetHeadroom
items.desc: Gets the number of bytes reserved at the front of the packet's buffer.

items.name: - GetLinkHeaderLength
items.desc: Gets the number of bytes to use for the link header.

items.name: - GetDataOffset
items.desc: Gets the offset to the beginning of the packet's data.

items.name: - GetDataLength
items.desc: Gets the number of bytes of data in the packet.

items.name: - GetMemorySegmentOffset
items.desc: Gets the offset to the beginning of the packet in the corresponding memory buffer.

items.name: - GetPacketBufferPool
items.desc: Gets the memory buffer that contains the pakcet.
